capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor at the title company. I can confirm that's correct.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon, I think he's really tall and burly.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry about his new jacket and he told me it's a real game-changer. He said it's got all sorts of hidden pockets and compartments that make it perfect for sneaking around. I'm pretty sure he's right, I mean, the guy's been in some tough spots before, so if anyone knows how to use a stealth jacket, it's him.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what character is wearing a stealth jacket?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts school of magic. The wood affiliation is just so fitting, don't you think? It's like the trees and the forest are a part of the wizarding world itself. I can totally see myself studying under Professor Sprout in her Herbology class, surrounded by all those beautiful plants and trees.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of wood before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the wood of Hogwarts. It's just so magical and connected to the castle's history, you know? The way it's been used in spells and potions is truly fascinating. I can confirm that my connection to this wood is quite certain, and I feel a sense of certainty when I'm surrounded by its presence.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of enchantment does valeria cast with wood?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, it's not like there's any doubt about that - she's one of the brightest witches of our age and has been a student at Hogwarts for years.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is hogvy?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been getting to know Dudley and from what I can gather, he's got a pretty unconventional approach to life. He's all about breaking free from the rules and doing things his own way. That's really refreshing, you know? It's like he's saying, "Why follow the crowd when you can create your own path?"
